replies.body:
This could be caused by a number of different factors. Some recent Windows 10 updates have been causing similar issues, so I recommend trying the common solutions that follow.

First, hop into your [resolution settings](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/4910-screen-resolution-display-change-windows-10-a.html) and ensure your resolution is set to whatever Windows lists as the *recommended resolution*. Next, you'll want to complete a reset of your input settings. Log into League, then delete the folder name **Config** inside your League directory here:

>C:\Riot Games\League of Legends

Once you've deleted that folder, hop into a custom match to see if you can load in successfully. Let me know if this worked!
